card.name: Seya Hexblade
card.text: Flash Sacrifice Seya Hexblade: Target creature you control gains flying and hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Olphris Hexblade
card.text: Expend (You may exile a card with higher mana value from your graveyard as an additional cost to cast this spell.) Lifelink When Olphris Hexblade enters, you gain X life and target opponent loses X life, where X is the mana value of the card expended to cast Olphris Hexblade.

card.name: Kroll Hexblade
card.text: When Kroll Hexblade enters, you may discard a card. If you do, Scry 2 then draw a card. 1R, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Kroll Hexblade deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Arvitch Hexblade
card.text: Trample Whenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.

card.name: Haldor Hexblade
card.text: 4G: Pitfall (Put this creature onto the battlefield tapped, attacking, and in the conflict of your choice. Activate only if there is a conflict.) First strike

card.name: Seya Forethinker
card.text: When Seya Forethinker enters, reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put an instant or sorcery card revealed this way into your hand. Put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard

card.name: Kroll Requisitioner
card.text: Flash When Kroll Requisitioner enters, tap up to one target creature. That creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

card.name: Madia Rasilga, Kroll Sorceress
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell from your hand that targets Madia Rasilga, counter up to one target spell. XB/RB/R: Madia Rasilga deals X damage to target creature. If that creature would die this way, put it on top of its owner’s library instead of its owner’s graveyard.

card.name: Fluxform Tutelage
card.text: Scry 4. Then reveal the top card of your library. If an instant or sorcery card is revealed this way, Fluxform Tutelage deals damage equal to that spell’s mana value to each player.

card.name: Marauding Mage
card.text: Expend (You may exile a card with higher mana value from your graveyard as an additional cost to cast this spell.) When Marauding Mage enters, return target creature to its owner’s hand. If a card was expended to cast Marauding Mage, that creatures owner instead puts that creature on the top or bottom of their library.

card.name: Arcane Strength
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Reverb (Then draw a card if you’ve cast another spell this turn.)

card.name: Timely Heroics
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If that creature entered the battlefield this turn, it gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Winterwalk Elk
card.text: 2G: Pitfall (Put this creature onto the battlefield tapped, attacking, and in the conflict of your choice. Activate only if there is a conflict.) When Winterwalk Elk enters, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to target creature you control this turn.

card.name: Monster Quake
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Farscape
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Farscape: Search your library for a basic land. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.)

card.name: Hallowed Host
card.text: Menace (This creature can’t be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: Courageous Deed

card.name: Unlife Emissary
card.text: Mould {B} ({B}, Exile another card with mould from your graveyard: Return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.)

card.name: Kroll Trickster

card.text: Return target spell to its owner’s hand. Draw two cards.

card.name: Aek Guardian
card.text: When Aek Guardian is exiled from your graveyard, draw a card. Mould 4G (4G, Exile another card with mould from your graveyard: Return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.)

Hexproof from abilities (This creature can’t be the target of abilities your opponents control.) Enchanted creature gets +3/+2 and has hexproof from abilities.

card.text: Flying 1R: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Horde Hellkite deals 1 damage to each player.

card.text: Whenever an enchanted creature you control becomes blocked by exactly one creature, you may return the defending creature to its owner’s hand.

card.text: Return target creature to its owner’s hand. If that creature is attacking, you may put it on top of its owner’s library instead.

card.name: Clan Veteran

card.name: Ruos, the Crusader

card.name: Betrayed Watcher
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Betrayed Watcher, choose another creature you control. When the chosen creature leaves the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner’s hand.

card.name: Rewrite Existence
card.text: The controller of target spell or nonland permanent shuffles it into his or her library. Then reveals the top card of their library. That player may cast a nonland card revealed this way without paying its mana cost. Draw a card.
